subject: Soccer
Bribery and Kickbacks
lead_paragraph: Sepp Blatter, FIFA’s president, said he wanted to set up an anticorruption committee after the allegations that two members of FIFA’s 24-member executive committee had offered to sell their votes.
snippet: Sepp Blatter, FIFA’s president, said he wanted to set up an anticorruption committee after the allegations that two members of FIFA’s 24-member executive committee had offered to sell their votes.
